title: Vidukathaiya Intha Vazhkai Song Lyrics Muthu
stanzas:
enadhu kai ennai
adippadhu pol
enadhu viral kannai
keduppathu pol
azhudhu ariyaadha
en kangal aaru
kulamaaga maaruvadho..

yaen endrum
kaetkavum naadhi illai.
aezhaiyin needhikku
kan undu paarvai illai

pasuvinai paambendru
satchi solla mudiyum
kaambinil visham enna
karakkavaa mudiyum

udambil valindhodum
udhiram unai kaetkum
naan seidha
theengu enna
naan seidha
theengu enna

vandhu vilugindra
mazhai thuligal
endha idam saerum
yaar kandaar

mazhai thanil
thondrudhu gangai nadhi
adhu kadal sendru
saervadhu kaala vidhi.

ivanukku ival endru
ezhudhiya kanakku
kanakkugal puriyaamal
kanavukkul vazhakku (2)

kaigalil ponn alli
nee koduthaai.
indru kangalil kanneer
yaen koduthaai.

kaaviyangal unai paada
kaathirukkum pozhudhu
kaavi udai nee kondaal
ennavaagum manadhu.(2)

vazhvai nee thaedi
vadakkae nee ponaai
naangal povadhengae..
naangal povadhengae..
